name: Lost Economy (Canceled)
blurb: An economy based game where the player uses political skill & cunning abilities to control markets and build wealth.

rewards.reward: What can you get for a dollar nowadays? Well in this case you let a team with an idea know they have a chance. Every donation sends us an email, letting us know we have believers and you support us. Thank you!

You dont have deep pockets, you dont have to, we love you anyways! Your support lets us, the little guys, know that we have something special and people like you believe in that! We thank you and your name (if you choose) will be put on our wall of supporters. Thank you!
BASIC PACKAGE: You're in! You get the BASIC tier game with in-game badge showing the world you were a pioneer!
You get the Basic Package, plus now your a BETA Tester! We need you guinea pig!
+++SILVER-STATUS+++ You will be a Beta Tester, the SILVER game tier for ONE FULL YEAR! And both, Unique Silver Avatar items and Silver In-game Badge.
+++GOLD-STATUS+++ You will be a Beta Tester, the GOLD game tier for ONE FULL YEAR! And both, Unique Gold Avatar items and Gold In-game Badge.

+++SILVER-PLUS+++ Skip the monthly stuff, you will have the SILVER tier options permanently unlocked, you know this project will be a success and you strongly support us! Along with forever SILVER status you will receive Unique Silver Avatar items and Silver In-game Badge

+++GOLD-PLUS+++ Skip the monthly stuff, you will have the GOLD tier options permanently unlocked, you know this project will be a success and you strongly support us! Along with forever GOLD status you will receive Unique Gold Avatar items and Gold In-game Badge

CHIEFTAIN: You get the game, youre a beta tester, in-game badge; But now you also get 1 GOLD-PLUS account and 1 SILVER-PLUS account for that friend you know will like it once they try. Plus, you name one of the local leader (NPC) characters. Forever leaving your creativity in the game!

MONUMENTAL: You get the game, youre a beta tester, in-game badge,1 GOLD-PLUS account and 1 SILVER-PLUS, name a local leader (NPC) character; Plus now you get a unique in-game MONUMENT building, not only does this look cool, but it increases leadership skills.

LUCKY 100: You get the game, youre a beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, not one but TWO GOLD-PLUS accounts. We are rewarding you for telling that friend that you know will love this game too!
TRAVELER: You get the game, youre a beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, two GOLD-PLUS accounts. PLUS, you name one of the NPC towns!

BOTANIST: You get the game, youre a beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, two GOLD-PLUS accounts, you name an NPC town. Additionally, you name an in-game plant or product, forever leaving your creativity in the game!

ADVISOR: You get the game, youre a beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, two GOLD-PLUS accounts, name NPC town, AND you design the look and name of  one of the NPC Advisors who offer tips/advice/help to players!

CLAN LEADER: You know bargain when you see it, you know you have 4 friends who will play this game with you, and it only makes sense that all 5 of you are GOLD-PLUS!!! You have just created your own personal team and are ready for the adventure to come; along with this package you will receive: the game, beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, name NPC town, and the look/name of a NPC Advisor.

FIRST TO FIND: Five GOLD-PLUS accounts, the game, beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, name NPC town, the look/name of a NPC Advisor, AND you choose and name (1 of 9) unique map features (examples: River or Mountain range) forever leaving your creativity in the game!

REGIONAL LEADER: Five GOLD-PLUS accounts, the game, beta tester, in-game badge, name a local leader (NPC) character, unique in-game MONUMENT building, name NPC town, the look/name of a NPC Advisor, PLUS you choose the look & name of one of the default regional leaders and the city in which the regional market is set and become the regional leader yourself.  You play as the Regional Leader, with the regional market and city as your own!

MAKER: You made the game!!! You have deep pockets and you can appreciate the time, work, effort and creativity this game possesses. You have succeeded in life and you choose to reward others in return.  You have taken a weight off our shoulders and we thank you.  Your in-game rewards will be you name & design the center city and its world-wide market.  You will play as the world leader, choosing the name & design as the most powerful world leader.  Your name will be honored in both the game and on our website.  We thank you for your generous gift!
